---
name: Feature Request
about: 提出一个新功能需求 / Suggest a new feature
title: "[Feature] "
labels: enhancement
---

### 需求描述 (Feature Description)
描述你希望增加的功能。
Describe the feature you'd like to add.

### 为什么需要？ (Why is this needed?)
解释原因。
Explain the reason.

### 补充说明 (Additional Context)
可选。
Optional.
